duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform automotive diagnostics, vehicle inspection, and mechanical repairs according to BSRO procedures.
Lead and instruct other technicians in diagnostic and repair activities.
Explain mechanical diagnoses and repairs to non-mechanical individuals, including teammates and Managers.
Manage online presence and social media channels to maximize customer engagement and conversions.
Plan industry events and conferences to showcase services and network with potential clients.
Measure and report on the performance of automotive services and repairs, using data-driven insights to improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent, with a minimum 5 years of automotive repair experience. A.S.E. certification in at least 5 (five) of A1-A8 is preferred.
